game.name: Autocard - Your RPG Adventure
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Autocard is a Roguelike with AutoChess elements where you manage cards and your typical RPG statistics. Create the best build, uncover combos, and overcome RNG to defeat your opponents and save the World. Choose between 3 Classes and start your journey in this strategic yet chill game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Autocard is a Roguelike with AutoChess elements where you manage cards and your typical RPG statistics. Create the best build, uncover combos, and overcome RNG to defeat your opponents and save the World. Choose between 3 Classes and start your journey in this strategic yet chill game.
